sentences.sentence: Method The clinical test of multicentric random parallel control was used.
sentences.translation: 方法多中心随机平行对照临床试验。

sentences.sentence: The pathogenesis of this multicentric disorder may be associated with autoimmune disease.
sentences.translation: 它的多器官受累可能与自身免疫疾病的发病机制相似。

sentences.sentence: Because multicentric CD is so rare, there is not a lot of information on how well chemotherapy works.
sentences.translation: 因多中心CD非常罕见，在如何化疗更好的作用没有很多的信息。
